meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stringy.
meanings.sent1: The stringiness of the cheese made it difficult to cut.
meanings.sent2: I don't like the stringiness of okra when it's cooked.
meanings.sent3: The stringiness of the spaghetti was so extreme that it looked like a spider web.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a natural stringiness to it, resembling golden threads.
meanings.sent5: The stringiness of the glue made it perfect for creating intricate designs.

meanings.definition: The tendency to form strings or strands.
meanings.sent1: The stringiness of the dough made it ideal for making homemade noodles.
meanings.sent2: The stringiness of the caramel added a delicious texture to the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The stringiness of the yarn caused it to tangle easily while knitting.
meanings.sent4: The stringiness of the seaweed reminded me of a mermaid's hair floating in the water.
meanings.sent5: The stringiness of the plant's roots helped it anchor firmly in the soil.
